alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, northwestern Caroline, northwestern Hanover, northwestern Powhatan and Fluvanna Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Spotsylvania to near Ferncliff to 6 miles northeast of Centenary. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 45 mph and rainfall 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locally heavy rainfall may cause ponding of water in poor drainage and low lying areas. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Louisa around 700 PM EDT. Mineral around 715 PM EDT. Hadensville around 720 PM EDT. Fork Union around 725 PM EDT. Cartersville, Milford, Columbia, Lakeside Village, Ladysmith, Duncan and Gum Spring around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Chilesburg, Orchid, Maidens, Three Square, Central Plains, Bremo Bluff, Whiteville, Michaux, West View and Nancy Wrights Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong wind gusts are possible with these storms. These wind gusts are capable of knocking down tree limbs, small or weakened trees, and blowing around trash cans, potted plants, lawn furniture, and other light outdoor objects. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
